name: ts-for-gir-timers-example
description: Simple Gjs Gtk 4 example app to demonstrate how you can use .ui template XML files

scripts.build:types: npm run ts-for-gir -- generate Gtk-4.0 -e gjs
scripts.build: npm run build:types && npm run build:app
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run start:app
scripts.validate: npm run validate:types && npm run validate:app

author: Pascal Garber <pascal@artandcode.studio>
